raw: Nintendo Is Likely to Suffer Global Switch Shortages From Virus .
replaced: Nintendo Is Likely to Suffer Global Switch Shortages From Virus .

raw: ( Bloomberg ) --
replaced: ( Bloomberg ) --

raw: Nintendo Co. is likely to struggle to supply sufficient Switch consoles to its U.S. and European markets as soon as April due to a production bottleneck caused by the coronavirus outbreak , according to people with knowledge of the company ’s supply chain .
replaced: Nintendo is likely to struggle to supply sufficient Switch consoles to Nintendo U.S. and European markets as soon as April due to a production bottleneck caused by the virus outbreak , according to the people .

raw: Limited component supply coming out of China is affecting output at a Nintendo assembly partner ’s factory in Vietnam , which the gaming giant primarily uses to build consoles for the U.S. , said the people , asking not to be named because the details are private .
replaced: Limited component supply coming out of China is affecting output at a Nintendo assembly partner ’s factory in Vietnam , which Nintendo primarily uses to build consoles for The U.S. , said the people , asking not to be named because the details are private .

raw: A shortage of components this month would affect Switch units scheduled for arrival in April , after existing inventory and current shipments of the console have sold through .
replaced: A shortage of components this month would affect Switch units scheduled for arrival in April , after existing inventory and current shipments of Nintendo have sold through .

raw: The potential slowdown would deal a blow to the Kyoto - based company , which is preparing to release a major new installment in the hit Animal Crossing game franchise on Mar. 20 .
replaced: The potential slowdown would deal a blow to the Kyoto - based company , which is preparing to release a major new installment in the hit Animal Crossing game franchise on Mar. 20 .

raw: These first - party titles are the lifeblood of the Switch system ’s popularity , sustaining its sales momentum as it enters its fourth year since launch .
replaced: These first - party titles are the lifeblood of the Switch system ’s popularity , sustaining the Switch system sales momentum as the Switch system enters the Switch system fourth year since launch .

raw: Nintendo apologized earlier this month when it announced that Switch hardware and accessory shipments to Japan would be constrained by a virus - imposed production shutdown in China .
replaced: Nintendo apologized earlier this month when Nintendo announced that Switch  Those products  Japan would be constrained by a virus - imposed production shutdown in China .

raw: Those products are now out of stock across many Japanese retailers , due also in part to aggressive cashback campaigns by local mobile - payment providers .
replaced: Those products are now out of stock across many Japanese retailers , due also in part to aggressive cashback campaigns by local mobile - payment providers .

raw: “ We do not see any major impact on the shipment to the U.S. currently , but we will remain vigilant and take steps if necessary , ” a Nintendo spokesperson told Bloomberg News .
replaced: “ Nintendo do not see any major impact on the shipment to The U.S. currently , but Nintendo will remain vigilant and take steps if necessary , ” a Nintendo spokesperson told Bloomberg News .

raw: “ It ’s possible the supply would be affected by the virus if it becomes more widespread and prolonged . ”
replaced: “ It ’s possible the supply would be affected by the virus if the virus becomes more widespread and prolonged . ”

raw: Switch shipments arriving into the U.S. in February and March wo n’t pose any issue because they ’ve already been dispatched from Asia , said the people familiar with Nintendo ’s operations .
replaced: Switch shipments arriving into The U.S. in February and March wo n’t pose any issue because they ’ve already been dispatched from Asia , said the people familiar with Nintendo ’s operations .

raw: But difficulty may arise with accumulating enough units for the boats departing later this month or next , which would be arriving in the U.S. in April .
replaced: But difficulty may arise with accumulating enough units for the boats departing later this month or next , which would be arriving in The U.S. in April .

raw: Shipments would not completely stop , but would be greatly reduced , according to one person .
replaced: Shipments would not completely stop , but would be greatly reduced , according to one person .

raw: The U.S. is the company ’s biggest market , accounting for 43 % of its core business , while Europe and Japan account for 27 % and 21 % , respectively .
replaced: The U.S. is the company ’s biggest market , accounting for 43 % of The U.S. core business , while Europe and Japan account for 27 % and 21 % , respectively .

raw: Suppliers within Chinese factories , which provide components to a wide variety of electronics products , said they expect the virus disruption to last at least a few more weeks before they can resume full operation .
replaced: Suppliers within Chinese factories , which provide components to a wide variety of electronics products , said Suppliers within Chinese factories , which provide components to a wide variety of electronics products , expect the virus disruption to last at least a few more weeks before Suppliers within Chinese factories , which provide components to a wide variety of electronics products , can resume full operation .

replaced: Speaking on condition of anonymity , Suppliers within Chinese factories , which provide components to a wide variety of electronics products , said Suppliers within Chinese factories , which provide components to a wide variety of electronics products , primary concern is resuming production too early and finding a coronavirus infection among Suppliers within Chinese factories , which provide components to a wide variety of electronics products , returned workers , leading to an outbreak on factory floors .
